items.title: 6 people in critical condition after 11 stabbed at Michigan Walmart in 'brutal act'
items.description: Authorities in Michigan say a man entered a Walmart in Traverse City on Saturday afternoon with a folding knife and stabbed 11 people.

items.title: Allianz Life confirms data breach affecting majority of 1.4M US customers
items.description: Hackers have accessed the personal data of most of the 1.4 million customers.
